channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Build a Streamlit application with Fabric SQL Database】使用Fabric SQL数据库构建简化应用程序
item.description: 【Building an application allows you to operationalize the data you have in Microsoft Fabric, such that it can be consumed by stakeholders in your organization to generate business insights. Streamlit is easy to use to build simple applications without needing to know front-end application frameworks like Flask, Django etc. It makes it easier to prototype […]】构建应用程序可以使您可以在Microsoft Fabric中运行您的数据，从而可以由组织中的利益相关者消费以生成业务见解。 简化很容易用于构建简单的应用程序，而无需了解烧瓶，django等前端应用程序框架。它使原型更容易[…]

item.title: 【Find the IDE features you need with GitHub Copilot and Search】查找GitHub Copilot和搜索所需的IDE功能
item.description: 【Ever find yourself needing to locate a specific menu item, command, or option in Visual Studio, but you don’t know its name or location? Do you often struggle to find detailed instructions on using certain features effectively? Now, there’s a solution to get you the information you need right in the IDE. Visual Studio now […]】有没有发现自己需要在Visual Studio中找到特定的菜单项，命令或选项，但是您不知道其名称或位置？您是否经常难以找到有效使用某些功能的详细说明？现在，有一个解决方案可以为您提供IDE中所需的信息。 Visual Studio现在[…]

item.title: 【Upcoming Updates for Azure Pipelines Agents Images】Azure Pipelines代理图像的即将到来的更新
item.description: 【To ensure our hosted agents in Azure Pipelines are operating in the most secure and up-to-date environments, we continuously update the supported images and phase out older ones. In October 2024, we announced support for Ubuntu-24.04. Soon, we plan to update the ubuntu-latest image to map to Ubuntu-24.04. Additionally, MacOS 15 Sequoia and Windows 2025 […]】为了确保我们在最安全和最新的环境中运行的Azure管道中的托管代理，我们不断更新受支持的图像并逐步逐步淘汰较旧的图像。 2024年10月，我们宣布支持Ubuntu-24.04。很快，我们计划更新Ubuntu-latt的图像以将其映射到Ubuntu-24.04。此外，MacOS 15红杉和Windows 2025 […]

item.title: 【.NET 10 Preview 2 is now available!】.NET 10预览2现在可用！
item.description: 【Find out about the new features in .NET 10 Preview 2 across the .NET runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, C#, .NET MAUI, and more!】在.NET 10 Preview 2中查找.NET运行时，SDK，Libraries，ASP.NET Core，Blazor，C＃，.Net Maui等等中的新功能！

item.title: 【Vector Search with Azure SQL, Semantic Kernel and Entity Framework Core】使用Azure SQL，语义内核和实体框架核心搜索矢量搜索
item.description: 【Vector databases like Qdrant and Milvus are specifically designed to efficiently store, manage, and retrieve embeddings. However, many applications already use relational databases like SQL Server or SQL Azure. In such cases, installing and managing another database can be challenging, especially since these vector databases may not offer all the features of a modern relational […]】QDRANT和MILVUS等矢量数据库的专门设计用于有效地存储，管理和检索嵌入。但是，许多应用程序已经使用了关系数据库，例如SQL Server或SQL Azure。在这种情况下，安装和管理另一个数据库可能具有挑战性，尤其是因为这些向量数据库可能无法提供现代关系的所有功能[…]

item.title: 【Accelerating Agentic Workflows with NVIDIA AgentIQ, Azure AI Foundry and Semantic Kernel】使用NVIDIA Ageniq，Azure AI Foundry和语义内核加速代理工作流程
item.description: 【Today, we’re excited to announce our collaboration with NVIDIA. In Azure AI Foundry, we’ve integrated NVIDIA NIM microservices and the NVIDIA AgentIQ toolkit into Azure AI Foundry—unlocking unprecedented efficiency, performance, and cost optimization for your AI projects. Read more on the announcement here. Optimizing performance with NVIDIA AgentIQ and Semantic Kernel Once your NVIDIA NIM […]】今天，我们很高兴宣布我们与Nvidia的合作。在Azure AI铸造厂中，我们将NVIDIA NIM微服务和NVIDIA Ageniq Toolkit集成了Azure AI铸造厂 - 将前所未有的效率，性能和成本优化释放为您的AI项目。在此处阅读有关公告的更多信息。一旦您的nvidia nim […]，用NVIDIA Ageniq和语义内核优化性能

item.title: 【C++ Dynamic Debugging: Full Debuggability for Optimized Builds】C ++动态调试：优化构建的完整调试性
item.description: 【Over the past 5 years, we’ve had many incredible opportunities to engage with game developers. From AAA studios to indie developers, the passion for slashing iteration times is significant. Amidst all the fantastic feedback we’ve received for Visual Studio, one sentiment has rung loud and clear: a desire to debug optimized C++ code without sacrificing […]】在过去的5年中，我们有许多与游戏开发人员互动的机会。从AAA工作室到独立开发人员，对削减迭代时代的热情非常重要。在我们为Visual Studio收到的所有奇妙反馈中，一个情绪大声而清晰：渴望调试优化的C ++代码而无需牺牲[…]

item.title: 【You can’t simulate keyboard input with PostMessage, revisited】您无法使用邮政事间模拟键盘输入，重新审视
item.description: 【If it didn't go through the input system, it only looks like input as much as the app allows itself to be fooled.】如果它没有通过输入系统，它看起来只像输入一样多，就像该应用程序允许自身被愚弄一样。

item.title: 【MSTest 3.8: Top 10 features to supercharge your .NET tests!】MSTST 3.8：增强.NET测试的前10个功能！
item.description: 【MSTest 3.8 is here! It's built on your feedback and packed with powerful new features to simplify and smooth your testing experience.】Mstest 3.8在这里！它建立在您的反馈基础上，并包含强大的新功能，以简化和平滑您的测试体验。

item.title: 【Securing Developer Tools with Authentication Brokers】使用身份验证经纪人确保开发人员工具
item.description: 【If you’ve used any applications that required connecting your personal Microsoft or Entra ID account, you’re probably familiar with the typical “authentication dance” – you see a browser window pop up, you enter your credentials, then you can close the browser, and the application is magically authenticated. The next application you launch does the same […]】如果您使用了任何需要连接个人Microsoft或Entra ID帐户的应用程序，那么您可能熟悉典型的“身份验证舞蹈” - 您会看到浏览器窗口弹出，输入凭据，然后您可以关闭浏览器，并且该应用程序具有神奇的认证。您启动的下一个应用程序执行相同的[…]
